RemoteCameraPropertyChangeListener
=========================
``com.connectsdk.service.capability.RemoteCameraControl.RemoteCameraPropertyChangeListener``

Method
--------------

void **onChange** (RemoteCameraProperty *property*)
   Calls when a camera setting such as brightness or AWB on the TV is changed.
   For the property types, refer to  :doc:`RemoteCameraProperty <and-remotecameraproperty>`.

    **Parameters:**

    * property - Remote camera property
